Metadata.title: Coptic Translator
Metadata.description: Automatically translate phrases and sentences between English, Arabic and Coptic, free of charge.

Page.english-input-msg: Type or paste English text here
Page.sahidic-coptic-input-msg: Type or paste Sahidic Coptic text here
Page.bohairic-coptic-input-msg: Type or paste Bohairic Coptic text here
Page.arabic-input-msg: Type or paste Arabic text here
Page.german-input-msg: Type or paste German text here
Page.french-input-msg: Type or paste French text here
Page.dutch-input-msg: Type or paste Dutch text here
Page.input-length-error: Input too long. Try smaller chunks at a time.
Page.input-length-warning: Input contains multiple lines. Translations may be more inaccurate. Try using one or two lines at a time for better accuracy.
Page.startup-warning: ‚è≥ Model is starting up, this can take up to 15 seconds. Consider donating to help improve our servers.
Page.server-down-err: Server is down. Please try again later.
